title: Goat Island Timeline Placement
theoryText: Some fans theorize about where exactly the Goat Island Arc fits in the timeline. Since it occurs between the Post-Alabasta episodes and the Jaya Arc, there's speculation about whether the crew was heading toward Jaya during this detour or if they were still in Paradise waters exploring.
author: One Piece Community

title: Zenny's Miraculous Survival
theoryText: Despite Chopper's diagnosis that Zenny had only three days to live due to his heart condition, the character demonstrates remarkable vitality throughout the arc. Some fans theorize this was meant to show themes about the power of having a purpose or dream keeping someone alive longer than medically expected, similar to other One Piece themes about willpower overcoming physical limitations.
author: One Piece Community
